ca.projectTOMi.tomi.persistence

Interface TimesheetRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Timesheet,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Timesheet,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Timesheet,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Timesheet>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Timesheet,java.lang.Long>

    public interface TimesheetRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Timesheet,java.lang.Long>
    TimesheetRepository is used to persist and retrieve data regarding Timesheet from the database.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot

        Returns:

      • getEntriesStatusesByTimesheet

        @Query(value="SELECT status FROM Entry WHERE timesheet.id = :timesheetId AND active = true ")
java.util.List<Status> getEntriesStatusesByTimesheet(@Param(value="timesheetId")

        Gets all the Status of all active Entrys associated with a provided Timesheet.
        Parameters:
        timesheetId - the unique identifier for the timesheet
        Returns:
        List of Status for entries on the timesheet
